advancement.crucial.get_backpack.desc: Fashion a Backpack out of Ravager Hide.
advancement.crucial.get_bottled_cloud.de: Fill up a bottle with clouds at the cloud level.
advancement.crucial.get_forgotten_hat.de: Loot a Forgotten Hat from the namesake monster underground.
advancement.crucial.get_diamond_heart.de: Acquire a Heart of Diamond from a Stoneling.
advancement.crucial.get_pickarang.desc: Craft a Pickarang using a Heart of Diamond.
advancement.crucial.get_slime_in_a_bucke: Capture a tiny Slime in a Bucket.
advancement.crucial.get_empty_antique_at: Craft an Antique Atlas so you can avoid losing yourself.
advancement.crucial.get_paraglider.desc: Discover a Paraglider inside a Wild Tower.
advancement.crucial.get_seed_pouch.desc: Craft a Seed Pouch to hold lots of seeds in one place.
advancement.crucial.get_beanstalk.desc: Plant and dig up a Beanstalk.
advancement.crucial.get_spyglass.desc: Acquire a Spyglass so you can see further beyond.
advancement.crucial.get_advancement_fram: Craft an Advancement Frame to display your feats.
advancement.crucial.get_all_crystals.des: Mine up every color of Corundum and Corundum Cluster.
Collect every type of Music Disc and Ambience Disc.
advancement.crucial.get_all_saplings.des: Acquire every Sapling, even the extinct ones.
advancements.crucial.override.upgrade_he: Collect the Healer's Pouch rarely from Piglin Bartering and completely level it up
enchantment.allurement.alleviating.desc: Heals the player upon collection of experience.
enchantment.allurement.launch.desc: Launches the target upwards instead of away.
enchantment.allurement.reeling.desc: Pulls targets towards the user upon arrow impact.
enchantment.allurement.reforming.desc: Repairs the durability items very slowly over time when in use.
enchantment.allurement.shockwave.desc: Creates a shockwave when taking fall damage that damages nearby entities.
enchantment.allurement.vengeance.desc: Stores some incoming damage and applies it to your next attack.
enchantment.supplementaries.stasis.desc: Blocks fired from the slingshot will not be affected by gravity.
Picked up items will go directly into the shulker box.
Refills held block and item stacks from the shulker box inventory.
effect.minecraft.absorption.description: Adds damage absorption (additional hearts that can't be regenerated).
effect.minecraft.unluck.description: Can reduce chances of high-quality and more loot.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.description: Causes an illager raid to start upon entering a village.
effect.minecraft.blindness.description: Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit.
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.descripti: Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning.
effect.minecraft.dolphins_grace.descript: Increases swimming speed (only obtainable from dolphins).
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.descrip: Prevents the affected entity from taking damage due to fire, lava and other sources of fire damage.
effect.minecraft.glowing.description: Outlines the affected entity (can be seen through blocks).
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Gives discounts on trades with villagers, and makes villagers throw items at the player depending on their profession.
effect.minecraft.invisibility.descriptio: Grants invisibility, making the affected entity invisible (but not the item they hold), and reduces other mobs' detection range for the affected entity.
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.description: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage.
effect.minecraft.luck.description: Can increase chances of high-quality and more loot.
effect.minecraft.night_vision.descriptio: Lets the player see well in darkness and underwater.
effect.minecraft.poison.description: Inflicts damage over time (but can't kill).
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.descriptio: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.descrip: Prevents drowning and lets the affected entity breathe underwater.
effect.abundance.succumbing.description: Received damage will also inflict poison.
effect.abundance.supportive.description: Gives regeneration to passive mobs, strength to neutral mobs and resistance to hostile mobs.
effect.atmospheric.gelled.description: Extinguishes burning if not in a fire source. Also reduces damage from burning and slowly applies regeneration.
effect.atmospheric.persistence.descripti: Increases movement speed proportional to lower hunger levels.
effect.atmospheric.relief.description: Reduces the amount of damage taken from attacks.
effect.atmospheric.spitting.description: Causes the rapid spitting of seeds as long as the effect is active.
effect.atmospheric.worsening.description: Increases the amount of damage taken from attacks.
effect.autumnity.extension.description: Increases the duration of newly applied effects.
effect.autumnity.foul_taste.description: Once this effect is applied, the next consumed food will fill more food points. Afterwards, the effect is removed.
effect.buzzier_bees.sunny.description: Makes some entities behave as if it were daytime; Phantoms ignore mobs with the effect, bees won't sleep, and undead will burn.
effect.environmental.panic.description: Boosts movement speed proportional to lower health levels (applied after being hit while wearing a Healer's Pouch).
effect.environmental.serenity.descriptio: Prevents mobs from spawning nearby. There may be a Gossip entry that can provide more insight here.
effect.fantasy.glowing_vision.descriptio: Causes Unicorns in a radius of 500 blocks to obtain the glowing effect, making them easier to locate.
effect.farmersdelight.comfort.descriptio: Removes and prevents weakness, slowness, and hunger status effects from being applied.
effect.farmersdelight.nourished.descript: Prevents losing hunger from any action besides healing.
effect.fruitful.sustaining.description: Increases the food points filled when consuming foods.
effect.infernalexp.infection.description: Slowly causes damage until at half a heart, and can also be spread to nearby entities.
effect.infernalexp.luminous.description: Causes one to become a light source, and causes undead to burn.
effect.neapolitan.agility.description: Allows climbing onto any vertical surface.
effect.neapolitan.berserking.description: Increases attack damage and defense as more mobs are killed.
effect.neapolitan.harmony.description: Causes nearby monsters in the vicinity to run away.
effect.neapolitan.slipping.description: Makes it hard to stand still, as if slipping around. Can be caused by stepping on a banana peel.
effect.neapolitan.sugar_rush.description: Increases movement speed at the start of the status effect, but movement will begin to slow down as the effect goes on.
effect.neapolitan.vanilla_scent.descript: Blocks any incoming status effects from being applied.
effect.quark.danger_sight.description: Allows seeing the places where monsters can spawn. There may be a Gossip entry that can provide more insight here.
effect.savageandravage.frostbite.descrip: Greatly slows down movement speed, and slowly inflicts damage. Inflicted by an icey illager foe.
effect.savageandravage.weight.descriptio: Greatly slows down movement speed, and prevents jumping. Inflicted by a tricky illager foe.
effect.seasonals.puppeteering.descriptio: When one with this effect attacks an entity, it copies their own movement onto the entity.
effect.seasonals.thorn_resistance.descri: Provides resistance to thorny damage sources.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.repellence.descri: Applies poison to any mobs collided with.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.vibing.descriptio: Applies regeneration to any mobs collided with.
effect.alexsmobs.ender_flu.description: Applied by Enderiophages, and will cause another one to spawn once the effect is over, inflicting damage in the process.
effect.alexsmobs.lava_vision.description: Allows seeing under lava, as if it were like water.
effect.alexsmobs.orcas_might.description: Grants increased attack speed after swimming with Orcas.
effect.alexsmobs.soulsteal.description: Attacking enemies will have the chance to steal some of their health.
effect.alexsmobs.sunbird_blessing.descri: Makes falling occur slower, and also makes it easier to fly with an elytra.
effect.alexsmobs.sunbird_curse.descripti: Makes falling occur faster, making it almost impossible to fly with an elytra.
